text: The First Echelon () is a 1955 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov.ПЕРВЫЙ ЭШЕЛОН It stars Vsevolod Sanayev, Nikolay Annenkov, and Oleg Yefremov. ==Actors== * Vsevolod Sanayev as Alexey Yegorovich Dontsov, state farm director * Nikolay Annenkov as Kashtanov, secretary of the RC * Oleg Yefremov as Alexey Uzorov * Izolda Izvitskaya as Anna Zalogina * Nina Doroshina as Nelly Panina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: The First Echelon
